text: Warren Weinstein (July 3, 1941 â€“ January 14, 2015) was an American contractor and economist. He was a director in Pakistan for J.E. Austin Associates.J.E. Austin Associates, Inc. website He was kidnapped by eight al-Qaeda members on August 13, 2011 in Lahore, Pakistan. He was killed in a January 2015 US drone strike on the Afghanistan-Pakistan border. His death was announced by U.S. President Barack Obama at a White House press conference on April 23, 2015. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American economists Category:Kidnapped American people Category:Scientists from Maryland
title: Warren Weinstein
